title: Obtaining key fragments takes too long.
body:
I know Riot doesn't necessarily like F2P players, but I'm one of them, and key fragments take too long to gather up. I have around 15 chests and only 2 key fragments... Please make another way for F2P players to get champ shards. 

BTW, I don't main any champ... I just play for fun and i want more key frags to unlock more champs...

replies.body:
keys are earned from being honorable/teamplayer/friendly/ exc.


i have over 40 keys and no chests.

how?  im a support main, my playstyle is empowering my team. thus i get a lot of honor, and a lot of keys.
But isn't there a cap of 4 key fragments each week or something?

I disagree. Get a key frag every 5 games just by pressing the honour button and not being toxic (and thus not being reported).

Tbh I need more chests
Hm... I get a key frag every other day i log in, and i usually get 1 or 2 honors every game that i don't feed...
shit i have no chest and 28 keys as of right now.
Then just play more champs or have a friend get an s rank for you
